source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000010_YOTSUYU<tab>Open wide, now...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000010_YOTSUYU<tab>Schön den Mund aufmachen, Herr Samurai. Aaah<var 1D /var>...!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000020_GOSETSU<tab>Please, Tsuyu. I am not so frail that I cannot feed myself.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000020_GOSETSU<tab>Ach lass doch, Tsuyu. Ich kann schon noch alleine essen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000030_GOSETSU<tab>Ah, I grow weary of the taste of gruel...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000030_GOSETSU<tab>Für diese fade Grütze kann ich mich ohnehin nicht begeistern.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000040_YOTSUYU<tab>You don't like it? Can I fetch you something else?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000040_YOTSUYU<tab>Magst du keinen Reisbrei? Was willst du denn dann essen?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000050_GOSETSU<tab>Aye. Wine! Or if that is not “wholesome” enough─I don't know...a sweet persimmon from Namai? I enjoyed them in my youth.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000050_GOSETSU<tab>Tja<var 1D /var>... Um diese Zeit reifen in Namai die Kaki-Früchte. Was gäbe ich darum, jetzt ihren süßen Saft zu schmecken<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000060_YOTSUYU<tab>A persimmon.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000060_YOTSUYU<tab>Kakis<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000070_GOSETSU<tab>Nay, pay me no mind─I am full. Besides, we have guests.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000070_GOSETSU<tab>Jetzt haben wir aber genug vom Essen geredet.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000080_ALISAIE<tab>I hope we are not interrupting your meal. We had heard you were confined to bed, and thought you might welcome some visitors.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000080_ALISAIE<tab>Wir wollten dir einen Krankenbesuch abstatten. Aber wie ich sehe, wirst du bereits bestens versorgt<var 1D /var>... Herr Samurai. <kicher>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000090_GOSETSU<tab>Confined to─ A gross exaggeration!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000090_GOSETSU<tab>E-Es geht mir gut, danke.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000100_GOSETSU<tab>A trifle drained from my exertions, perhaps. But with a little rest, I shall be fighting fit again in no time!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000100_GOSETSU<tab>Ich war nur etwas erschöpft, weiter nichts. Ich werde bald wieder meinen Dienst antreten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000110_YOTSUYU<tab>Take off your clothes.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000110_YOTSUYU<tab>Hast du dich schon ausgezogen, Herr Samurai?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000120_ALISAIE<tab>Gosetsu! Is this how you've been spending your time!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000120_ALISAIE<tab>A-Ausgezogen?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000130_GOSETSU<tab>My lady, I assure you, this is not─
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000130_GOSETSU<tab>Es ist doch nur<var 1D /var>...!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000140_YOTSUYU<tab>Off with them. We need to wash you─you stink!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000140_YOTSUYU<tab>Nun mach schon. Waschen muss sein. Du stinkst!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000150_ALPHINAUD<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000150_ALPHINAUD<tab><kicher> ...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000160_YOTSUYU<tab>What are all these scars? There are so many of them...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000160_YOTSUYU<tab>Hast du dir wehgetan?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000170_GOSETSU<tab>A life of battle will leave its mark upon a man...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000170_GOSETSU<tab>Ein Leben als Krieger hinterlässt nun mal Spuren.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000180_GOSETSU<tab>Is something wrong, Tsuyu?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000180_GOSETSU<tab>Hast du was, Tsuyu?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000190_YOTSUYU<tab>It's nothing. I'm fine.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000190_YOTSUYU<tab>Nein. Nichts.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000200_GOSETSU<tab>Bah, leave me be, woman! I will not be fussed over like some newborn babe!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000200_GOSETSU<tab>Gib her, das kann ich selbst. Noch bin ich kein alters<var 16 /var>schwacher Tattergreis!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000210_ALPHINAUD<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000210_ALPHINAUD<tab>Hahahahaha!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000220_ALISAIE<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000220_ALISAIE<tab>Mhmhmhmhm!

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000230_YOTSUYUGreetings. Might I have one of y─ Wait! Please!
...I only wanted a persimmon.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000230_YOTSUYU<tab>(-Tsuyu-)Entschuldigung<var 1D /var>... Kann ich eine Kaki haben?<var 1D /var>... Warte! Lauf doch nicht weg!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000240_E3F2VILLAGERE<tab>Kami save us! Her spirit has returned!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000240_E3F2VILLAGERE<tab>Sie ist wieder da! Mögen die Götter uns beistehen!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000250_E3F2VILLAGERF<tab>She's back from the dead to seek her revenge!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000250_E3F2VILLAGERF<tab>Sie ist zurück! Rette sich, wer kann!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000260_ISSE<tab>It can't be! She couldn't have survived!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000260_ISSE<tab>Das ist doch<var 1D /var>... Yotsuyu! Sie lebt!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000270_YOTSUYU<tab>What did I... Wh-What did I do?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000270_YOTSUYU<tab>(-Tsuyu-)Was<var 1D /var>... Was habe ich getan?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000280_ISSE<tab>As if you don't know!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000280_ISSE<tab>Was du getan hast? Du<var 1D /var>...!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000290_HIEN<tab>Good people of Namai─be at ease, I pray you! You have naught to fear!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000290_HIEN<tab>Beruhigt euch! So beruhigt euch doch!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000300_ISSE<tab>My lord, forgive me but─what is that monster doing here!? They told us she was dead!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000300_ISSE<tab>König Hien! Ist sie es wirklich? Wir dachten, sie wäre tot.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000310_HIEN<tab>I too was surprised to learn of her survival.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000310_HIEN<tab>Das dachte ich auch.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000320_HIEN<tab>More even than you, I would hazard. 'Twas I who cut her down. I who left her to her fate.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000320_HIEN<tab>Ich habe sie beim Kampf um die Burg niedergestreckt und hielt die Wunde für tödlich.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000330_HIEN<tab>But it would seem the kami had other plans. By some miracle, both she and Gosetsu were spared when the keep collapsed─though Yotsuyu's preservation came at the cost of her memory.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000330_HIEN<tab>Aber sie hat überlebt, meinen Schwertstreich und sogar den Einsturz des Burgturms. Doch dabei verlor sie ihr Gedächtnis.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000340_ISSE<tab>You're saying she's <var 1A 02 /var>forgotten<var 1A 01 /var>? Forgotten everything she's done!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000340_ISSE<tab>All das, was sie uns angetan hat<var 1D /var>... Das hat sie <var 1A 02 /var>vergessen<var 1A 01 /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000350_E3F2VILLAGERF<tab>Lies! Lies, my lord! She would say anything to escape punishment!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000350_E3F2VILLAGERF<tab>Die lügt doch! Lasst euch von der Hexe nicht täuschen!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000360_E3F2VILLAGERE<tab>What does it matter!? <var 1A 02 /var>We<var 1A 01 /var> have not forgotten her crimes! And we demand justice! I beg of you, Lord Hien, draw your blade and rid us of this canker!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000360_E3F2VILLAGERE<tab>Wen interessiert's, an was sie sich erinnert! Wir vergessen ihre Verbrechen jedenfalls nicht! Tötet sie, König Hien!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000370_YOTSUYU<tab>What I saw, then. It's all true.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000370_YOTSUYU<tab>(-Tsuyu-)Warum hassen mich alle<var 1D /var>...? Was<var 1D /var>... Was hab ich getan?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000380_YOTSUYU<tab>I'm sorry! I'm so, so sorry...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000380_YOTSUYU<tab>(-Tsuyu-)Es tut mir leid! Es tut mir so leid! Bitte verzeiht mir!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000390_ISSE<tab>You're “sorry”!? And what, we're supposed to forgive you?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000390_ISSE<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Es tut mir leid?<var 1A 01 /var> Nach alledem?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000400_AZAMI<tab>Here, there's no need to cry.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000400_AZAMI<tab>Wein doch nicht.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000410_AZAMI<tab>Can't you see how scared she is? How can you be scared of her? She's not the same.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000410_AZAMI<tab>Sie tut doch keinem mehr was. Seht doch, wie sie zittert<var 1D /var>... Die Arme.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000420_HIEN<tab>Until such time as her memories return, this woman shall be known as “Tsuyu,” and treated as a citizen of Doma.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000420_HIEN<tab>Solange Yotsuyu nicht genesen ist, werden wir sie wie jede andere Domanerin auch behandeln.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000430_HIEN<tab>I will, however, see that she is watched at all times. Rest assured that there will be no more unannounced visits to the village. As your lord, I ask that you leave her fate in my hands, and suffer her to live. For now.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000430_HIEN<tab>Sie wird bewacht werden und dieses Dorf nicht ungebeten betreten. Dafür verbürge ich mich.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000440_AZAMI<tab>Please, Isse...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000440_AZAMI<tab>Ja, Isse?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000450_ISSE<tab>All right. I'll keep my peace.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000450_ISSE<tab>Gut. Wenn du meinst, dass es gerecht ist, bin ich einverstanden.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000460_ISSE<tab>As long as you're happy. That's all that matters.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000460_ISSE<tab>Hauptsache, du musst dich nie wieder vor etwas fürchten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000470_ASAHI<tab>What a pleasure it is to see you once more, Lord Hien. Not to mention my dear sister.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000470_ASAHI<tab>Was für eine Freude, dich wiederzusehen, König Hien. Und dich, liebe Schwester.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000480_HIEN<tab>A pleasure to see you too, Ambassador. Forgive us our late arrival.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000480_HIEN<tab>Die Freude ist ganz meinerseits, Gesandter Asahi.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000490_HIEN<tab>You have our people aboard the airship?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000490_HIEN<tab>Sind die Domaner an Bord des Luftschiffs?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000500_ASAHI<tab>Exactly as agreed. We would leave you in no doubt as to the purity of our intentions. I daresay it was the selfsame spirit of cooperation which prompted you to bring Yotsuyu here today.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000500_ASAHI<tab>Natürlich, alle heil und unversehrt. Wie ich höre, hast du auch alles Erforderliche in die Wege geleitet. Sogar Yotsuyu hast du mitgebracht.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000510_HIEN<tab>Indeed. Before excluding her from the exchange, I thought it only fair that you see her condition for yourself. Physically, she is in fine health, but her mind is unchanged.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000510_HIEN<tab>Ich wollte, dass du sie selber siehst. Sie hat ihr Gedächtnis immer noch nicht wiedererlangt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000520_ASAHI<tab>So I see.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000520_ASAHI<tab>Es sieht ganz so aus.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000521_ASAHI<tab>But all need not necessarily be lost. In anticipation of this tragic turn of events, I took the liberty of inviting some special guests...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000521_ASAHI<tab>Übrigens habe ich jemanden mitgebracht, den Yotsuyu unbedingt treffen sollte. Du hast doch bestimmt nichts dagegen?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000530_ASAHIFATHER<tab>(-???-)Ah, Yotsuyu! You look...well.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000530_ASAHIFATHER<tab>(-???-)Yotsuyu<var 1D /var>... Schön, dich wiederzusehen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000540_YOTSUYU<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000540_YOTSUYU<tab>(-Tsuyu-)Ah<var 1D /var>... Haah<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000550_HIEN<tab>Of all the people...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000550_HIEN<tab>Das sind doch nicht etwa<var 1D /var>...?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000560_ASAHI<tab>Is something wrong, dear sister? These are our beloved parents. Does not the sight of them bring back sweet childhood memories?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000560_ASAHI<tab>Was ist denn, Schwester? Hast du sogar unsere lieben, lieben Eltern vergessen?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000570_YOTSUYU<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000570_YOTSUYU<tab>(-Tsuyu-)Aaah<var 1D /var>... Aaahh<var 1D /var>...!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000580_YOTSUYU<tab>...Gosetsu. I have to take this to Gosetsu...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000580_YOTSUYU<tab>(-Tsuyu-)Die Kaki<var 1D /var>... für den Herrn Samurai<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000590_ASAHI<tab>Hmph. It would seem my little surprise was not sufficient.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000590_ASAHI<tab>Es hilft nichts. Sie kann sich tatsächlich an nichts erinnern.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000600_ASAHI<tab>You needn't glare at me so, Lord Hien─I merely did what any loving son would do for his family. Lest you doubt, I am content to leave the acting viceroy in your care. Pray treat her as you would any daughter of Doma.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000600_ASAHISieh mich nicht so an. Es war einen Versuch wert!
Also gut. Wir werden sie als gewöhnliche Domanerin betrachten. Sie darf bei euch bleiben.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000610_ASAHI<tab>Do not grow too fond of this place, dear sister. You will come back to us ere long.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000610_ASAHI<tab>Aber wir werden uns bald wiedersehen, Schwester. Sehr bald<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000620_HIEN<tab>We continue with the exchange as planned, then.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000620_HIEN<tab>Kommen wir jetzt zum Gefangenen<var 16 /var>austausch.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000630_ASAHI<tab>Very good. The structure across the river should serve our needs. We shall await you there with the conscripts if you would bring your captives...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000630_ASAHI<tab>Aber sicher doch. Die Anlage am anderen Flussufer sieht gut erhalten aus. Dort werden wir die Domaner absetzen und ihr unsere Soldaten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000640_HIEN<tab>Agreed. Until then, Ambassador.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000640_HIEN<tab>Einverstanden. Ich werde den Befehl geben.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000650_HIEN<tab>Gosetsu, are you awake?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000650_HIEN<tab>Gosetsu ... Bist du wach?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000660_GOSETSU<tab>My lord! Come in, come in...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000660_GOSETSU<tab>Ach, mein Herr. Bitte tretet ein.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000670_GOSETSU<tab>When Tsuyu returned, her eyes were red from weeping. She spoke not a word─simply sat and peeled some fruit she'd brought for me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000670_GOSETSU<tab>Tsuyu sah schrecklich aus, als sie zurückkam. Als hätte sie lange geweint. Sie hat mir eine Kaki geschält und kein Wort gesprochen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000680_GOSETSU<tab>She then claimed weariness and retired to her chamber. Tell me, what happened to upset her so?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000680_GOSETSU<tab>Dann ist sie auf ihr Zimmer gegangen und hat sich schlafen gelegt. Was ist nur mit ihr los?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000690_HIEN<tab>The ambassador arranged a surprise reunion with her foster parents. A misguided attempt to restore Yotsuyu to her senses.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000690_HIEN<tab>Asahi hat Yotsuyus Eltern mitgebracht. Er wollte erzwingen, dass sie ihr Gedächtnis wiedererlangt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000700_HIEN<tab>It was plain their presence caused her great distress, but she seemed otherwise unaffected.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000700_HIEN<tab>Ihre Erinnerung ist nicht zurückgekehrt, aber sie hielt sich den Kopf, als würde sie leiden.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000710_ALISAIE<tab>Yotsuyu was mistreated as a child, was she not? It was a cruel trick to use her tormentors like that, knowing the pain it could cause.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000710_ALISAIE<tab>Asahi weiß genau, was ihre Zieheltern mit Yotsuyu angestellt haben. Und trotzdem quält er sie, nur um einen Vorteil für sich zu gewinnen? Das zeigt doch, was er für ein Schuft ist!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000720_GOSETSU<tab>Hmph. I like this Asahi less and less...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000720_GOSETSU<tab>Dann ist es ja kein Wunder<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000730_HIEN<tab>Be that as it may, he has agreed to allow Yotsuyu to remain with us in Doma. Our primary concern now is to hand over the prisoners without incident, and bring our people safely home.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000730_HIEN<tab>Asahi war einverstanden, dass Yotsuyu in Doma bleiben soll. Jetzt bleibt uns nur noch, den Gefangenen<var 16 /var>austausch durchzuführen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000740_ALPHINAUD<tab>There was one other detail at the meeting which caught my attention.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000740_ALPHINAUD<tab>Eine Sache macht mir dabei Sorgen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000750_ALPHINAUD<tab>I assume you all noticed the rather suspect crates within the castrum? The imperials were quick to retrieve them afterwards, but I wonder...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000750_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ich habe vorhin in Castrum Fluminis ein paar verdächtigte Behälter gesehen. Die Garlear haben sie zwar nach dem Treffen wieder mitgenommen, aber<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000760_ALISAIE<tab>Out with it, Brother. You fear they might contain bombs or war machines?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000760_ALISAIE<tab>Die hab ich auch gesehen. Meinst du, dass sie Bomben oder Kampf<var 16 /var>maschinen darin versteckt haben?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000770_HIEN<tab>If the ambassador wanted me dead, he has had ample opportunity. No, assassination is not his intent, but we should be on our guard for other acts of treachery.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000770_HIEN<tab>Wohl nicht. Wenn sie uns töten wollten, hätten sie dazu schon Gelegenheit gehabt. Aber ihr habt Recht, wir sollten wachsam bleiben.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000780_DOMANMAID<tab>My lord! Forgive me, but the lady Yotsuyu─she's gone!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000780_DOMANMAID<tab>Bitte entschuldigt<var 1D /var>... Es ist<var 1D /var>... Yotsuyu. Sie ist verschwunden!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000790_GOSETSU<tab>Gone!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000790_GOSETSU<tab>Was?!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000800_DOMANMAID<tab>I beg your pardons, my lords. I was certain she had fallen asleep...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000800_DOMANMAID<tab>Ich dachte, sie schläft, a-aber ihr Bett war leer! Bitte vergebt mir, ich<var 1D /var>... ich hätte besser aufpassen müssen!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000810_HIEN<tab>No, no, the responsibility is mine. 'Twas I who gave her a room instead of a cell.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000810_HIEN<tab>Lass nur, die Schuld liegt bei mir. Ich war es, der sie in einem unversperrten Zimmer unterbringen ließ.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000820_HIEN<tab>She may simply have wandered outside. We will organize search parties.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000820_HIEN<tab>Wahrscheinlich hat sie das Gebäude schon verlassen. Am besten, wir teilen uns auf und beginnen umgehend mit der Suche.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000821_HIEN<tab>Might I call upon your assistance?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000821_HIEN<tab>Würdet ihr uns bitte dabei helfen?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000830_ASAHIFATHER<tab>(-???-)Help... Help...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000830_ASAHIFATHER<tab>(-???-)Aaah<var 1D /var>... Ah<var 1D /var>... Uh<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000840_ASAHIFATHER<tab>Help... Help me...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000840_ASAHIFATHER<tab>Aaaah<var 1D /var>... Hilfe<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000850_YOTSUYU<tab>If only I hadn't remembered.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000850_YOTSUYU<tab>Wenn ich mich doch nur nicht erinnert hätte<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000860_YOTSUYU<tab>He should <var 1A 02 /var>hate<var 1A 01 /var> me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000860_YOTSUYU<tab>Den Hass der Domaner hätte ich ertragen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000870_YOTSUYU<tab>But I will not suffer his kindness. Not after what I did to him.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000870_YOTSUYU<tab>Aber mit der Güte des Mannes, den ich töten wollte, kann ich nicht länger leben!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000880_ASAHIFATHER<tab>Who's there!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000880_ASAHIFATHER<tab>Wer ist da? Wer bist du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000890_ASAHIMOTHER<tab><gasp> ...Oh, it's you. What are you doing out here in the dark?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000890_ASAHIMOTHER<tab>Yotsuyu! Erschreck uns doch nicht so!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000900_ASAHIFATHER<tab>This is the enclave, is it? When the soldiers dragged us back to Doma, you were the last person I expected to see.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000900_ASAHIFATHER<tab>Was soll das alles? Wo sind wir hier? Der Soldat hat uns einfach rausgeworfen und gesagt, dass wir jetzt in Doma wohnen. Und was machst <var 1A 02 /var>du<var 1A 01 /var> hier?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000910_ASAHIMOTHER<tab>You're the bane of our existence, Yotsuyu! A font of misery!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000910_ASAHIMOTHER<tab>Es ist immer das Gleiche! Nichts als Ärger hat man mit dir!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000920_ASAHIMOTHER<tab>You couldn't even do us the simple courtesy of dying, could you! Oh no, you had to <var 1A 02 /var>live<var 1A 01 /var> and taint us with the shame of your failure!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000920_ASAHIMOTHER<tab>Ah! Nie machst du etwas richtig! Du bereitest uns nichts als Schande!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000930_ASAHIMOTHER<tab>We had a perfect life in the capital! And now they're making us wallow in this muddy ruin like common swine! I don't deserve this!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000930_ASAHIMOTHER<tab>Wir hätten ein bequemes Leben in der Kaiserstadt haben können, aber dank dir stehen wir jetzt mitten in diesen trostlosen Ruinen!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000940_ASAHIFATHER<tab>Now, now, dear, that'll do. There seems little point in berating the girl when she scarcely remembers her own name. Our time would be better spent contemplating how we're to survive this unhappy predicament.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000940_ASAHIFATHER<tab>Ach lass, sie kann sich ja an nichts erinnern. Wir sollten uns lieber überlegen, was wir jetzt machen sollen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000950_ASAHIFATHER<tab>You've kept your looks at least. I suspect you'd fetch a handsome price with the right buyer. Maybe enough to get us to Kugane and start a new business...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000950_ASAHIFATHER<tab>Hm. Eigentlich macht sie immer noch was her. Wenn wir sie an ein Freuden<var 16 /var>haus verkaufen, könnten wir von dem Geld in Kugane neu anfangen. Vielleicht einen Laden aufmachen<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000960_YOTSUYU<tab>
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000960_YOTSUYUNhnhahahahaaa...
He he... Ha ha ha ha haaa!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000970_YOTSUYU<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000970_YOTSUYU<tab>Haaahahahahahaa!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000971_YOTSUYU<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000971_YOTSUYU<tab>Ha haa<var 1D /var>... Haaa<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000980_YOTSUYU<tab>Ah, my beloved parents. No sooner do I wake from gentle slumber than the world returns in all its cruelty. Yes, this is how it always was. How it was meant to be.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000980_YOTSUYU<tab>Sie haben sich nicht verändert. Überhaupt hat sich nichts verändert. Ich wache auf, und die Welt ist immer noch die gleiche Hölle.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000990_YOTSUYU<tab>Very well. If I cannot escape my nature, then I shall embrace it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_000990_YOTSUYU<tab>All die Heuchelei von einem gerechten Doma<var 1D /var>... Diese Welt kennt und will nichts anderes als das Böse, und sie soll es bekommen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001000_YOTSUYU<tab>To the very depths I have sunk, my soul steeped in spite and rotten to the core. The self-righteous hide behind “justice,” but I need no such mask.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001000_YOTSUYU<tab>Ich bin in die tiefsten Abgründe dieses Landes gefallen. Meine Seele wurde vom Neid seiner Bewohner zerfressen! <var 1A 02 /var>Ich<var 1A 01 /var> bin das Böse dieser Welt!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001010_YOTSUYU<tab>Father. Mother. Was it not you who made me into this monster? Who taught me the truth of this miserable world?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001010_YOTSUYU<tab>So ist es doch, nicht wahr? Ich bin an all dem Elend schuld. Das habt ihr immer gesagt! <var 1A 02 /var>Ihr<var 1A 01 /var> habt mich zu der gemacht, die ich bin!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001020_YOTSUYU<tab>For years I knew naught but the taste of pain and humiliation, but the time has come to savor my vengeance against Doma. Against all my enemies.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001020_YOTSUYU<tab>Aber irgendwann ist jeder an der Reihe! Irgendwann muss jeder in die Abgründe blicken! Jeder Domaner<var 1D /var>... Jeder Peiniger<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001021_YOTSUYU<tab>And it begins...with you!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001021_YOTSUYU<tab>Und vor allem<var 1D /var>... <var 1A 02 /var>ihr<var 1A 01 /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001030_ASAHIFATHER<tab>Yotsuyu...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001030_ASAHIFATHER<tab>Yotsuyu!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001040_ASAHIFATHER<tab>What...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001040_ASAHIFATHER<tab>Nein! Argh!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001050_ASAHIMOTHER<tab>No!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001050_ASAHIMOTHER<tab>Ah!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001060_ASAHI<tab>Well done, dear sister. Did I not say you would come back to us?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001060_ASAHI<tab>Willkommen zurück, Schwester. Ich wusste, du würdest mich nicht enttäuschen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001070_YOTSUYU<tab>Brother dearest. What a surprise.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001070_YOTSUYU<tab>Du steckst also dahinter<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001080_YOTSUYU<tab>You always were a cold-blooded little worm. I doubt you thought twice about sending our parents to their deaths.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001080_YOTSUYU<tab>Ich hätte es mir ja denken können. Nur du bist so skrupellos, mich auf dein eigen Fleisch und Blut zu hetzen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001090_ASAHI<tab>Your dagger yet drips with their blood and you presume to judge <var 1A 02 /var>me<var 1A 01 /var>? To be frank, I didn't think you had the strength to slay them so cleanly. A single thrust each... I'm impressed!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001090_ASAHI<tab>Na komm, es waren auch deine Eltern. Du hast mich überrascht, Schwester. Du hast Vater und Mutter mit deinen eigenen Händen getötet.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001100_ASAHI<tab>But surely you can't be satisfied with murdering a pair of doddering elders. You yearn for a deeper vengeance...and the power to see it through.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001100_ASAHISonst musst du dich doch immer irgendwelcher Handlanger bedienen.
Sag... willst du nicht eigene Kräfte besitzen? Ungeheuerliche Kräfte...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001110_ASAHIFATHER<tab>Please... I don't want to die...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001110_ASAHIFATHER<tab>Bitte<var 1D /var>... Ich will nicht sterben<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001120_HIEN<tab>Any sign of her?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001120_HIEN<tab>Was ist los? Hast du sie gefunden?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001130_HIEN<tab>...What happened here?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001130_HIEN<tab>Das sind ja<var 1D /var>... die Naeuri!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001140_HIEN<tab>I knew what would happen if she recovered, and <var 1A 02 /var>still<var 1A 01 /var> I did nothing. ...You say she left with her brother?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001140_HIEN<tab>Sie hat sich erinnert und an ihren Eltern gerächt. Wahrscheinlich ist sie bereits über alle Berge<var 1D /var>... mit Asahis Luftschiff.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001150_HIEN<tab>Whatever he wants with her, he was willing to pay for it with his parents' lives...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001150_HIEN<tab>Er hat seine eigenen Eltern geopfert, um an Yotsuyu zu kommen. Warum? Was führt er im Schilde?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001160_HIEN<tab>But this is neither the time nor the place. We must gather the others.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001160_HIEN<tab>Wie auch immer, Vermutungen bringen uns nicht weiter. Lass uns ins Landhaus zurückkehren und die Lage besprechen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001170_ASAHI<tab>At last, the hour has come. The conclusion to these negotiations will mark a new beginning for Doma and the Empire─a first step on the road to peaceful coexistence!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001170_ASAHI<tab>Es ist so weit. Der heutige Tag ist der erste Schritt auf dem Weg zu einem dauerhaften Frieden zwischen Doma und Garlemald. Ein großartiges historisches Ereignis!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001180_HIEN<tab>Indeed. We are ready to proceed with the exchange when you are.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001180_HIEN<tab>Ich sehne auch den friedlichen Abschluss des Gefangenen<var 16 /var>austauschs herbei.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001190_HIEN<tab>Forgive my curiosity, Ambassador, but is there a purpose to these containers you bring with you?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001190_HIEN<tab>Übrigens<var 1D /var>... Dürfte ich fragen, was sich in diesen Behältern befindet?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001200_ASAHI<tab>Oh, the supply crates? They are filled with materials we hoped might be of use in Doma's restoration. I meant to gift them to you at our last meeting, but we had so much else to discuss...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001200_ASAHI<tab>Ach, darin ... Nur ein paar Dinge, die ich euch letztes Mal schon geben wollte. Güter, die ihr zum Wieder<var 16 /var>aufbau eures Reiches verwenden könnt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001210_HIEN<tab>How very generous. I confess, I had not expected such compassion, welcome though it is.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001210_HIEN<tab>Das wäre nicht nötig gewesen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001220_HIEN<tab>...But then I was <var 1A 02 /var>also<var 1A 01 /var> surprised by the news that one of our captives had delivered herself into your custody ahead of time─a minor discrepancy I shall overlook in the spirit of the occasion.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001220_HIEN<tab>Ihr habt die Erfüllung eines Teils der Abmachung ja schon selbst in die Hand genommen. Ein Detail, über das wir keine weiteren Worte verlieren müssen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001230_YOTSUYU<tab>Are you perhaps referring to me, Lord Hien?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001230_YOTSUYU<tab>(-???-)Sprecht ihr von mir?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001240_HIEN<tab>Yotsuyu.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001240_HIEN<tab>Yotsuyu<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001250_YOTSUYU<tab>Orphan of the Naeuri, widow of Sashihai...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001250_YOTSUYU<tab>Ganz recht. Yotsuyu, Tochter der Naeuri, Witwe des Sashihai<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001260_YOTSUYU<tab>...And acting viceroy of Doma! You and your people are mine to govern; mine to punish!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001260_YOTSUYU<tab>Und die Statthalterin von Doma! Eure Geißel und Unterdrückerin!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001270_HIEN<tab>Well, well. It would seem your shattered mind is mended. As per our agreement with the ambassador, you are free to return with him to the Empire.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001270_HIEN<tab>Da sie ihr Gedächtnis offenbar wiedererlangt hat, soll sie zurückkehren. So, wie es abgemacht war.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001271_HIEN<tab>Your authority as acting viceroy, however, is no longer recognized here.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001271_HIEN<tab>Aber eines vergesst nicht: Doma hat keine Statthalterin!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001280_YOTSUYU<tab>My position is not for you to decide, little lordling.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001280_YOTSUYU<tab>Ahahaha! Schweig, Aufständischer!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001290_YOTSUYU<tab>All who resist the rule of the Empire must be purged. Such was the order given to me by Lord Zenos himself!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001290_YOTSUYU<tab>Jeder, der sich gegen die Herrschaft des Kaiserreichs auflehnt, wird ausradiert! <var 1A 02 /var>Das<var 1A 01 /var> ist die Aufgabe, die Zenos mir erteilte!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001300_YOTSUYU<tab>I will reign here in this putrid, pestilent swamp until the last of you has been broken!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001300_YOTSUYU<tab>Ich beabsichtige, diese Aufgabe zu erfüllen und wieder über dein kümmerliches Land zu herrschen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001310_YOTSUYU<tab>This land shall know no dawn. I will spew forth darkness and drown all in eternal night. And high above you I shall shine uncaring, cold and distant as the moon!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001310_YOTSUYU<tab>Niemals werdet ihr das Licht der Freiheit erblicken. Die Finsternis in meinem Herzen wird alles verschlingen, und ein Land der Finsternis erschaffen. Nur einen eisigen Mond werdet ihr sehen<var 1D /var>- und das werde ich sein!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001320_HIEN<tab>What has she done!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001320_HIEN<tab>Was ist das für ein Licht?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001330_ALPHINAUD<tab>Oh, gods... This is a summoning!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001330_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ist das etwa ein Primae?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001340_ASAHI<tab>A Doman citizen has called forth an eikon in direct violation of our primary agreement. The negotiations have failed. Abandon the captives, and make preparations to withdraw.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001340_ASAHI<tab>Eine Domanerin hat einen Primae beschworen. Ein klarer Verstoß gegen die Abmachung. Dieses Treffen ist beendet. Bereitet den Abflug vor!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001350_MAXIMA<tab>But, Ambassador...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001350_MAXIMA<tab>Aber was wird aus dem Frieden?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001360_ASAHI<tab>Disobey me, Pilus, and you disobey the Emperor. Make preparations to withdraw─<var 1A 02 /var>now<var 1A 01 /var>.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001360_ASAHI<tab>Widersetzt du dich dem Befehl eines kaiserlichen Gesandten? Wir fliegen ab!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001370_MAXIMA<tab>...As you command.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001370_MAXIMA<tab>Grrr<var 1D /var>... Zu Befehl!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001380_YUGIRI<tab>My lord! You must fall back!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001380_YUGIRI<tab>König Hien, wir müssen uns zurückziehen!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001390_HIEN<tab>You ask me to run!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001390_HIEN<tab>Nein! Macht euch kampfbereit!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_Q1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_Q1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was sagst du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_A1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Leave this to me!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_A1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Überlasst das mir! Mit Primae ist nicht zu spaßen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_A1_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>A strategic withdrawal!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_A1_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Zieht euch zurück! Dies ist kein gewöhnlicher Gegner!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001400_HIEN<tab>Bah... Against such a foe, I would be more hindrance than help. The field is yours!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001400_HIEN<tab>Grrr ... Du hast Recht. Einem Primae bin ich nicht gewachsen<var 1D /var>... Ich vertraue auf dich!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001410_HIEN<tab>Spare my pride, would you? I know this foe is beyond me. The field is yours!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001410_HIEN<tab>Ja, einem Primae bin ich nicht gewachsen<var 1D /var>... Ich vertraue auf dich!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001420_HIEN<tab>We will withdraw...but not without our countrymen. I want every soul accounted for. Every soul!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001420_HIEN<tab>Wir ziehen uns zurück! Aber nicht ohne die Gefangenen! Seht zu, dass niemand zurückbleibt!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001430_YUGIRI<tab>My lord!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001430_YUGIRI<tab>Jawohl!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001440_TSUKUYOMI<tab>(-???-)I knew you would not flee. I see now the strength which flows from that baleful light of yours.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001440_TSUKUYOMI<tab>(-???-)<var 08 E905 ((Jetzt sind nur noch wir übrig. Die Göttin der Nacht und die Kriegerin des Lichts.)) ((Jetzt sind nur noch wir übrig. Die Göttin der Nacht und der Krieger des Lichts.)) /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001450_TSUKUYOMI<tab>(-Tsukuyomi-)But I am become Tsukuyomi, goddess of the moon and divinity of night. What power can compare to such celestial majesty!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001450_TSUKUYOMI<tab>(-???-)Deine verwunschene Gabe wird dir nichts nutzen. Denn ich bin Masokagami entstiegen<var 1D /var>... Ich bin die Herrscherin der Nacht und des Mondes<var 1D /var>... Ich bin Tsukuyomi!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001460_TSUKUYOMI<tab>I shall plunge all I despise into darkness! And within that black abyss, even your light shall flicker and fail.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001460_TSUKUYOMI<tab>Mit diesen Kräften kann ich alles und jeden auslöschen, und nicht einmal <var 1A 02 /var>du<var 1A 01 /var> wirst mich aufhalten!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001470_TSUKUYOMI<tab>Come, let us cast the stalks and look upon the fate of Doma. I see a future in which the sun sets on this wretched land once and for all!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001470_TSUKUYOMI<tab>Ein weiterer Kampf auf Leben und Tod. Doch diesmal werde ich gewinnen! Domas Zukunft<var 1D /var>... ist die Nacht!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001480_YOTSUYU<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001480_YOTSUYU<tab>Ah<var 1D /var>... ah<var 1D /var>... ahh<var 1D /var>... ahh<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001490_YOTSUYU<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001490_YOTSUYU<tab>Ah!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001500_ASAHI<tab>You really must learn to finish the job.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001500_ASAHI<tab>Wolltest du sie etwa schon wieder davonkommen lassen?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001510_ASAHI<tab>'Tis true that a gaudy mirror and a handful of crystals make for a feeble summoning, but even the weakest eikon is a god of sorts. A threat that must be put down.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001510_ASAHI<tab>Sie war zwar nicht mehr als eine primitive Götze, hervorgezaubert aus einem alten Kojin-Spiegel und ein paar Kristallen<var 1D /var>- aber sie war doch ein Primae.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001520_ASAHI<tab>My, my, such hostility! These beings are the sworn enemies of the Empire─I merely did my duty as an imperial officer.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001520_ASAHI<tab>Sieh mich nicht so an. Sie musste sterben, das war dir doch klar. Die Primae sind eine Bedrohung für uns alle.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001530_ASAHI<tab>Will you surrender to anger, then? Slay an anointed emissary to avenge a fallen foe?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001530_ASAHI<tab>Du willst mich töten, nicht wahr? Nur zu. Gib deinen Gefühlen nach. Töte mich! Aus Rache oder für die Gerechtigkeit! Streck mich nieder!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001540_ASAHI<tab>You cannot, of course. To do so would burn the bridges we have labored so hard to build!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001540_ASAHI<tab>Dann ist der Friede für alle Zeiten begraben!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001550_ASAHI<tab>Ah, but I'm forgetting: they're already ash! This <var 1A 02 /var>Doman<var 1A 01 /var> woman has seen to that! The Empire cannot ally itself with any nation that refuses to renounce summoning. I believe I was most clear on that point!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001550_ASAHI<tab>Ach, ich vergaß<var 1D /var>... Doma hat das Abkommen ja schon gebrochen. Wie konntet ihr nur zulassen, dass eine Domanerin einen Primae beschwört?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001560_ASAHI<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001560_ASAHI<tab>Ahahahahaaa hahahaha!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001570_ASAHI<tab>It should have been mine.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001570_ASAHI<tab>Eigentlich war es ja <var 1A 02 /var>meine<var 1A 01 /var> Berufung.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001580_ASAHI<tab>The power he bestowed upon her... I should have been the one to govern Doma! <var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> would have repaid his faith!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001580_ASAHI<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Ich<var 1A 01 /var> hätte Statthalter von Doma werden sollen. Unter meiner Herrschaft hätten wir die Provinz nie verloren!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001581_ASAHI<tab>No one alive loves him more than I!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001581_ASAHI<tab>Nur mir stand es zu, Prinz Zenos' Willen auszuführen!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001590_ASAHI<tab>Instead, this <var 1A 02 /var>harlot<var 1A 01 /var> betrayed his trust!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001590_ASAHI<tab>Zu nichts bist du zu gebrauchen! Gar nichts!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001600_ASAHI<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Useless...piece of...filth<var 1A 01 /var>!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001600_ASAHI<tab>Du wertloses Stück Dreck!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001610_ASAHI<tab>Worthless whore!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001610_ASAHI<tab>Straßendreck!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001620_ASAHI<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001620_ASAHI<tab>Ha ...!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001630_YOTSUYU<tab>Thank you, dear brother...for this precious gift. Vengeance.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001630_YOTSUYU<tab>Danke, Asahi<var 1D /var>... Ich danke dir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001640_YOTSUYU<tab>These people...<var 1A 02 /var>our<var 1A 01 /var> people...they ignore the corruption which festers beneath the surface. Cast aside that which is dirty and broken. Speak not of things which would disrupt their dreary little lives.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001640_YOTSUYU<tab>Deine Demütigungen haben mir beigebracht, zu hassen. ... Du warst der erste Domaner, den ich hasste.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001650_YOTSUYU<tab>Like you, Asahi...always pretending not to see. You were the first...the first I swore to kill.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001650_YOTSUYU<tab>Dank dir konnte ich meine Rache nehmen, an dem nieder<var 16 /var>träch<var 16 /var>tigen, verlogenen, schäbigen Doma.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001660_ASAHI<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001660_ASAHI<tab>Ha<var 1D /var>... ha<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001670_YOTSUYU<tab>Ahhh...such bliss. I had thought my hunger insatiable...but now...now I am satisfied.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001670_YOTSUYU<tab>Ich dachte, mein Hass würde niemals enden<var 1D /var>... Doch jetzt<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001680_YOTSUYU<tab>You should feel honored, dear brother. I saved the last of my strength just...for you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001680_YOTSUYU<tab>Meine Rache ist getan<var 1D /var>... Du bist mein letztes Opfer<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001690_YOTSUYU<tab>What's the matter? The witch of Doma will soon be dead.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001690_YOTSUYU<tab>Du hast gewonnen. Ich sterbe und du lebst. Das Gute hat gesiegt. Freust du dich denn nicht?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_Q2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_Q2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was antwortest du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_A2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Gosetsu will mourn you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_A2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Gosetsu wird um dich trauern.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_A2_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Tsuyu deserved a kinder fate.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_A2_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Doch. Weil das Gute gesiegt hat.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001700_YOTSUYU<tab>He will mourn Tsuyu, perhaps...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001700_YOTSUYU<tab>Ach<var 1D /var>... der Herr Samurai<var 1D /var>...<hust><var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001710_YOTSUYU<tab>Her happiness was never to be... Not in this world.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001710_YOTSUYU<tab>Ob der Samurai sich auch freuen wird?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001720_YOTSUYU<tab>I wonder... Was the fruit as sweet...as he remembered...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001720_YOTSUYU<tab>Kaki<var 1D /var>... E-Er aß so gerne Kaki<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001730_ASAHI<tab>Lord Zenos...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001730_ASAHI<tab>Ah<var 1D /var>... ah<var 1D /var>... Prinz Zenos<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001740_ASAHI<tab>Lord Zenos!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001740_ASAHI<tab>Eure Exzellenz!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001750_ASAHI<tab>I am at your disposal.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001750_ASAHI<tab>Ihr habt nach mir gerufen?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001760_ROBEMAN<tab>(-Zenos-)Asahi. You were born of Doma, yes?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001760_ROBEMAN<tab>(-Zenos-)Asahi<var 1D /var>... Du kommst doch aus Doma, nicht wahr?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001770_ASAHI<tab>Yes, my lord! I am honored that you would remember me. How may I serve?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001770_ASAHI<tab>Ja, Eure Exzellenz! Ich fühle mich geehrt, dass Ihr meinen Namen behalten habt. Womit darf ich Euch dienen?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001780_ROBEMAN<tab>(-Zenos-)You are hereby appointed ambassador plenipotentiary, and empowered to speak with the voice of the Emperor. Return to your native land of Doma, and announce your intention to sue for peace.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001780_ROBEMAN<tab>(-Zenos-)Ich ernenne dich hiermit zum bevollmächtigten kaiserlichen Gesandten. Reise nach Doma und nimm dort im Namen Garlemalds Friedensverhandlungen auf.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001790_ASAHI<tab>...For peace?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001790_ASAHI<tab>Friedensverhandlungen<var 1D /var>...?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001800_ROBEMAN<tab>(-Zenos-)Once negotiations are underway, you are to locate the acting viceroy.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001800_ROBEMAN<tab>(-Zenos-)So ist es. Außerdem wirst du Statthalterin Yotsuyu ausfindig machen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001810_ASAHI<tab>She <var 1A 02 /var>lives<var 1A 01 /var>? That is to say─I will, my lord.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001810_ASAHI<tab>Meine Schwester lebt? Selbstverständlich. Wie Ihr befehlt, Eure Exzellenz.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001820_ROBEMAN<tab>(-Zenos-)When you have found her, you will initiate a ritual to call forth an eikon. I will instruct you in the necessary steps.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001820_ROBEMAN<tab>(-Zenos-)Des Weiteren werde ich dich in die Geheimnisse der Götzenbeschwörung einweihen. Sobald du Yotsuyu gefunden hast, wirst du sie als Medium benutzen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001830_ROBEMAN<tab>(-Zenos-)Yotsuyu's faith is unreliable. But as a child raised to believe in the kami, she will serve as a vessel for one of the Kojin's gods. She need only wish it to be so.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001830_ROBEMAN<tab>(-Zenos-)Ihr Glaube ist zwar nicht stark genug für eine Beschwörung. Aber in ihrem Land gibt es unzählige von diesen Kami. Wenn man Yotsuyu ausreichend motiviert und dazu noch ein Artefakt der Kojin einsetzt, sollte sich einer rufen lassen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001840_ROBEMAN<tab>(-Zenos-)The power will seem a gift, but the eikon's essence will consume her. She will be no more than a husk, a slave to whim and desire.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001840_ROBEMAN<tab>(-Zenos-)Natürlich wird die Gottheit sofort von ihr Besitz ergreifen. Die Starken haben nun mal die Angewohnheit, die Schwachen zu ihren Sklaven zu machen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001850_ASAHI<tab>My lord, ever since the day you saw fit to save my miserable life, I have dreamed of repaying your benevolence. Upon my honor, I swear to devote myself wholly to your service. All that you command will be done, no matter the cost.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001850_ASAHI<tab>Eure Exzellenz. Seit dem Tag, an dem Ihr mich vor den Aufständischen gerettet habt, träume ich davon, Euch zu dienen. Ich bin zutiefst dankbar, nun diese Gelegenheit zu erhalten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001860_ASAHI<tab>B-But...I fear the subtleties of your plan yet elude me. From the reports I have heard, the champion who aids the Doman resistance would make short work of a single eikon...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001860_ASAHI<tab><var 08 E905 ((Aber die Domaner haben eine Heldin in ihren Reihen, die schon zahllose Götzen vernichtet hat. Wird sie nicht auch diesmal siegen?)) ((Aber die Domaner haben einen Helden in ihren Reihen, der schon zahllose Götzen vernichtet hat. Wird er nicht auch diesmal siegen?)) /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001870_ROBEMAN<tab>(-Zenos-)The eikon is merely a message. The pacifist teachings of the Populares spread through this city like a plague, and I would remind the people of the threat we face.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001870_ROBEMAN<tab>(-Zenos-)Mein Ziel ist ein ganz anderes. Wie du weißt, wollen die Popularen Frieden zwischen Garlemald und Doma.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001880_ROBEMAN<tab>(-Zenos-)You will be my chosen agent─the hand which tolls the warning bell. The salvation of this world will not be won through the signing of treaties.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001880_ROBEMAN<tab>(-Zenos-)Wir müssen den Weichlingen klarmachen, dass die Primae aus Doma eine Bedrohung sind. Nur wir können die Welt vor dem Untergang retten<var 1D /var>- mit Gewalt! Und du sollst mir dabei helfen, als meine rechte Hand.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001890_ASAHI<tab>Your chosen agent!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001890_ASAHI<tab>Als Eure rechte Hand?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001900_ASAHI<tab>I will not fail you, my lord!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001900_ASAHI<tab>Zu Befehl, Eure Exzellenz! Es wird geschehen, wie Ihr wünscht!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001910_ASAHI<tab>My... My master... Lord Zenos... He will come...for you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001910_ASAHI<tab>Prinz Zenos<var 1D /var>... Mein Herr und Meister<var 1D /var>... Er wird dich<var 1D /var>... Er wird dich<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001920_HIEN<tab>You have prevailed, I see!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001920_HIEN<tab>Ah, du bist wohlauf!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001930_GOSETSU<tab>She is gone.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001930_GOSETSU<tab>Tot. Sie ist tot.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001940_GOSETSU<tab>Wherefore did the kami spare us only to inflict this pain...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001940_GOSETSU<tab>Dass der Wille des Himmels so grausam sein kann<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001950_GOSETSU<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001950_GOSETSU<tab>Huhuhuhuhu<var 1D /var>... Nhuhuhuhu<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001960_HIEN<tab>Death shall not want for company this day. You spared us a worse disaster, but I fear our fledgling peace with the Empire was beyond saving.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001960_HIEN<tab>Yotsuyu und Asahi sind tot. Wir können von Glück reden, dass nicht mehr Unheil entstanden ist, aber damit sind wohl alle Chancen auf einen Frieden vertan.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001970_MAXIMA<tab>Lord Hien!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001970_MAXIMA<tab>Wartet!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001980_HIEN<tab>Maxima, is it not? I assumed you long fled.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001980_HIEN<tab>Was machst du noch hier?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001990_MAXIMA<tab>I entertain thoughts of escape even now. But our negotiations have yet to reach a satisfying conclusion. The ambassador insisted that the summoning spelled an end to our mission here, but it seemed to me there was more to the tale...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_001990_MAXIMA<tab>Als Beobachter war es meine Pflicht zu bleiben<var 1D /var>... Asahi bezeichnete die Beschwörung als Vertragsbruch. Ich denke, man kann die Dinge auch etwas anders sehen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_Q3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_Q3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was antwortest du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_A3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>I saw a vision of Asahi's past...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_A3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Ich habe alles gesehen<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_A3_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Zenos was behind this plot.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_A3_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Zenos hat den Befehl zur Primae-Beschwörung gegeben.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002000_MAXIMA<tab>I have heard tell of this power you wield. And in your vision, you witnessed Lord Zenos giving these orders?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002000_MAXIMA<tab>Prinz Zenos hat den Befehl gegeben? Und das hast du mit deiner Kraft des Transzendierens gesehen? Ich habe schon viel darüber gehört. Sie ist wirklich erstaunlich.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002010_HIEN<tab>But how can that be? Zenos is dead. He took his own life after the battle in Ala Mhigo.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002010_HIEN<tab>Zenos lebt? Das kann nicht sein. Er hat sich doch das Leben genommen. Nach dem Kampf auf dem Palast von Ala Mhigo.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002020_HIEN<tab>I saw his body with my own eyes!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002020_HIEN<tab>Ich habe seine Leiche selbst gesehen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002030_MAXIMA<tab>Forgive me, but Lord Zenos is very much alive─he granted our party an audience prior to our departure. That he was gravely wounded is certain, but his recovery appeared to be proceeding apace.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002030_MAXIMA<tab>Ich muss widersprechen. Prinz Zenos ist alles andere als tot, ich habe ihn erst kürzlich mit eigenen Augen gesehen. Er ist verwundet aus Ala Mhigo zurückgekehrt und befindet sich bereits auf dem Weg der Besserung.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002040_ALPHINAUD<tab>I am afraid I share Lord Hien's confusion. The man's death was confirmed and his remains interred. These are matters of public record.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002040_ALPHINAUD<tab>Wie ist das möglich? Wir haben ihn doch begraben!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002050_MAXIMA<tab>...Hmm. I have no doubt you believe what you say.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002050_MAXIMA<tab>Ihr meint es ernst, oder? Das ist keine List?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002060_MAXIMA<tab>But what then is the explanation? That an impostor has infiltrated the innermost circle of the imperial court? The idea is inconceivable, <var 1A 02 /var>absurd<var 1A 01 /var>...but worthy of investigation nonetheless. Our movement can ill afford to have a highly placed pretender undermining our efforts...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002060_MAXIMA<tab>Wenn nun wirklich jemand die Identität des toten Prinz Zenos angenommen hätte, um den Frieden mit Doma zu verhindern<var 1D /var>... Das wäre eine schwere Krise für das Kaiserreich.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002070_HIEN<tab>Your efforts may yet bear fruit. Tell me, what is to become of our prisoner exchange? Though we have already taken custody of our conscripts, we have yet to release your imperial comrades. Do you still intend to collect them?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002070_HIEN<tab>Dann sollten wir den Gefangenen<var 16 /var>austausch abschließen, solange wir noch können. Die Domaner sind bereits frei. Ich bin bereit, auch die garleischen Gefangenen freizugeben.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002080_MAXIMA<tab>Ah. Yes, as the late ambassador's second-in-command, it falls to me to speak on the Empire's behalf. And I am happy to confirm our intent to proceed according to the original agreement.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002080_MAXIMA<tab>Das wäre ganz im Sinne der Popularen. Der Frieden ist unser größtes Anliegen. Und da Asahi nun tot ist, bin ich als sein Stellvertreter befugt, den Austausch fortzusetzen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002090_HIEN<tab>Then let us be about it. 'Twould be a pity to abandon such a promising beginning.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002090_HIEN<tab>So soll es sein. Ich will jede Chance auf Frieden wahren.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002100_MAXIMA<tab>Indeed. You have my thanks, Lord Hien. As soon as our people are secure aboard our airship, we shall depart straightways for Garlemald.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002100_MAXIMA<tab>Ich danke Euch, König Hien. Sobald die Gefangenen auf unserem Luftschiff sind, werden wir heimkehren und die Angelegenheit untersuchen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002110_HIEN<tab>Tread lightly, Pilus. I sense treachery awaits you there.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002110_HIEN<tab>Geh vorsichtig vor. Es liegen düstere Dinge in den Schatten verborgen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002120_ALPHINAUD<tab>Might I accompany you to the capital?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002120_ALPHINAUD<tab>Dürfte ich den Abgesandten vielleicht begleiten?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002130_ALISAIE<tab>Alphinaud! Have you gone mad!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002130_ALISAIE<tab>Alphinaud!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002140_ALPHINAUD<tab>Impostor or no, if Zenos was instructing Asahi on the finer points of ritual summoning, then experience tells us there is an Ascian waiting in the wings.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002140_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ein Toter steht wieder auf und bringt den Garlearn die Primae-Beschwörung bei? Das hört sich für mich ganz nach den Machenschaften der Ascians an.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002150_ALPHINAUD<tab>Without our knowledge and expertise, our new friends will be hard-pressed to contend with a foe for whom death is but a minor inconvenience. They need our help.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002150_ALPHINAUD<tab>Die Ascians sind gefährliche Gegner. Sie sind nicht einmal an eine körperliche Existenz gebunden. Ohne unsere Erfahrung und unser Wissen ist es fast unmöglich, ihnen etwas entgegenzusetzen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002160_MAXIMA<tab>Were you indeed willing to share your knowledge of this enemy, we would not shun your counsel.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002160_MAXIMA<tab>Du bietest an, euer Wissen über die Ascians mit uns zu teilen? Wenn das so ist, bist du natürlich herzlich willkommen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002170_HIEN<tab>You truly mean to do this? In full knowledge of the danger?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002170_HIEN<tab>Du begibst dich in große Gefahr. Bist du dir sicher, Alphinaud?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002180_ALPHINAUD<tab>I have seen the Warrior of Light risk his life on countless occasions. Next to him, I am scarce more than a distraction on the battlefield.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002180_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ja. Ich habe unseren Helden auf viele Abenteuer begleitet, und mit seinen Kräften kann ich nicht Schritt halten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002190_ALPHINAUD<tab>I have seen the Warrior of Light risk her life on countless occasions. Next to her, I am scarce more than a distraction on the battlefield.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002190_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ja. Ich habe unsere Heldin auf viele Abenteuer begleitet, und mit ihren Kräften kann ich nicht Schritt halten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002200_ALPHINAUD<tab>But in the meeting room or the audience chamber, <var 1A 02 /var>there<var 1A 01 /var> I can make a difference. I can strike bargains, forge ties, and change minds. And where better to do these things than in the home of our old enemy?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002200_ALPHINAUD<tab>Aber ich bin in der Lage, Parteien mit unter<var 16 /var>schied<var 16 /var>lichen Interessen zu einem gemeinsamen Handeln zu führen. Auch, wenn sie mal Feinde waren.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_Q4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_Q4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was sagst du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_A4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>This is your moment!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_A4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Viel Glück, Alphinaud!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_A4_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>I believe in you, Alphinaud!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_A4_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Du schaffst es bestimmt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002210_HIEN<tab>'Tis not for me to stop you─but I would have you consider an alternative arrangement. Rather than braving the Empire as a simple traveler, go forth as an emissary of Doma. Such a position should offer you some measure of protection.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002210_HIEN<tab>Also gut. Dann ernenne ich dich hiermit offiziell zum Botschafter Domas. Ich hoffe, dass du mit diesem Titel eine angemessene Behandlung erfährst.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002220_ALISAIE<tab>Go, then. You've obviously made up your mind.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002220_ALISAIE<tab>Tja, da es ja sowieso sinnlos ist, dich aufhalten zu wollen, will ich dich ziehen lassen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002221_ALISAIE<tab>Just try not to do anything reckless, all right?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002221_ALISAIE<tab>Aber sei vorsichtig, hörst du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002230_ALPHINAUD<tab>I shall be on my best behavior. Farewell, my friends.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002230_ALPHINAUD<tab>Selbstverständlich. Also dann<var 1D /var>... Drückt mir die Daumen!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002240_HIEN<tab>How often have I imagined this moment... Thank you for helping it come to pass.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002240_HIEN<tab>Wie ich mich auf diesen Moment gefreut habe! Das haben wir alles nur dir zu verdanken.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002250_GOSETSU<tab>Ah, there you are.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002250_GOSETSU<tab>Hier seid Ihr also, Herr.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002260_ALISAIE<tab>Gosetsu, your hair!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002260_ALISAIE<tab>Gosetsu!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002270_YUGIRI<tab>My friend... What have you done...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002270_YUGIRI<tab>Du willst doch nicht etwa<var 1D /var>...?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002280_GOSETSU<tab>An old man who cannot raise his blade has no place in the service of a young lord.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002280_GOSETSU<tab>Ich habe kaum noch die Kraft, mein Schwert zu halten. Wie soll ich da meinem Herrn als Samurai von Nutzen sein?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002290_GOSETSU<tab>Thus did I decide to devote my remaining days to pilgrimage. I will walk this land, offering prayers of repose for all the souls who left this life in suffering.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002290_GOSETSU<tab>Also habe ich mich entschlossen, von nun an das Leben eines Wandermönchs zu führen und für die Seelen aller Gefallenen zu beten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002300_HIEN<tab>...All of them?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002300_HIEN<tab>Die Seelen <var 1A 02 /var>aller<var 1A 01 /var> Gefallenen<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_Q5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_Q5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was sagst du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_A5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Safe travels, Gosetsu!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_A5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Gute Reise, Gosetsu! Verlauf dich nicht!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_A5_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Don't leave us, Gosetsu!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_A5_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Verlass uns nicht, Gosetsu! Bitte!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002310_GOSETSU<tab>A fulsome farewell makes for an enjoyable journey!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002310_GOSETSU<tab>Hahaha! Vielen Dank. Ich werde mich von deiner guten Laune anstecken lassen und leichten Schrittes meine Reise beginnen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002320_GOSETSU<tab>This is no forlorn and final farewell! Send me on my way with a smile, my friends!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002320_GOSETSU<tab>Hahaha! Wir werden uns wiedersehen. Vielleicht sogar früher, als wir beide denken.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002330_HIEN<tab>Scarcely have we said our good-byes to Alphinaud, and you leave us too. Ah, but 'tis well that my companions find their own way forward. I must endeavor to do the same.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002330_HIEN<tab>Erst Alphinaud, jetzt auch noch Gosetsu. Aber so ist es, jeder muss seinen eigenen Weg gehen. Auch ich.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002340_GOSETSU<tab>I have faith that you will find the best path for Doma without me, my lord. Pray forgive me this last act of selfishness, and grant me your blessing.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002340_GOSETSU<tab>Ihr werdet Euren Weg finden und er wird uns alle in ein besseres Doma führen. Davon bin ich überzeugt. Herr, verzeiht Ihr mir?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002350_HIEN<tab>You have earned it. A thousand times over!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002350_HIEN<tab>Gewiss.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002360_HIEN<tab>Go in peace, my friend. I shall make of Doma a land where children laugh and none need live in fear.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002360_HIEN<tab>Gosetsu. Ich habe dir doch bereits versprochen, ein Doma zu errichten, auf das du stolz sein kannst. Und ich habe vor, mein Versprechen zu halten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002370_GOSETSU<tab>There is no better way to honor those who went before...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002370_GOSETSU<tab>Danke. Ich wünschte, <var 1A 02 /var>sie<var 1A 01 /var> könnte dieses Doma, ein gutes Doma, erleben.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002380_GOSETSU<tab>And with that I take my leave!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002380_GOSETSU<tab>Nun denn<var 1D /var>... lebt wohl!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002390_THANCRED<tab>Oh dear. We seem to be missing a corpse.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002390_THANCRED<tab>Das gibt's doch nicht. Der Sarg ist leer!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002400_ALISAIE<tab>Well it must be somewhere. I only hope it isn't walking around...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04300_002400_ALISAIE<tab>Dann ist es also wahr<var 1D /var>...
